mapper.select: select concat(tb.FCL_NM,' ',tb.ins_plce_nm) as FCL_NM from facility_check_03 ta, facility tb where 1=1 and ta.id = tb.id and tb.pss_cd= #{pssCd} AND date_format(ta.chk_Dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') between DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) AND now() and (cnn_sts_yn != 0)

select concat(tb.FCL_NM,' ',tb.ins_plce_nm) as FCL_NM from facility_check_03 ta, facility tb where 1=1 and ta.id = tb.id and tb.pss_cd= #{pssCd} AND date_format(ta.chk_Dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') between DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) AND now() and (vdo_file_yn != 0)

select concat(tb.FCL_NM,' ',tb.ins_plce_nm) as FCL_NM from facility_check_04 ta, facility tb where 1=1 and ta.id = tb.id and tb.pss_cd= #{pssCd} AND date_format(ta.chk_Dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') between DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) AND now() and (cnn_sts_yn != 0)

select concat(tb.FCL_NM,' ',tb.ins_plce_nm) as FCL_NM from facility_check_05 ta, facility tb where 1=1 and ta.id = tb.id and tb.pss_cd= #{pssCd} AND date_format(ta.chk_Dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') between DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) AND now() and (cnn_sts_yn != 0)

SELECT TB.chk_Dt, TA.hdqr_nm, TA.pss_nm, TA.FCL_NM,TB.cpu_use_qnt,TB.ram_use_qnt,TB.hdd_use_qnt,TA.power_bizp_nm, TB.status ,TB.statusCheck FROM facility TA, ( (select ID,round(cpu_use_qnt) as cpu_use_qnt, round((ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100) as ram_use_qnt, round((hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100) as hdd_use_qnt, chk_Dt , case when (round(cpu_use_qnt) > #{thVal1} || round((ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100) > #{thVal1} || round((hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100) > #{thVal1} ) then '비정상' else '정상' end status , case when cpu_use_qnt > 90.0 then 'CPU' when (ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100 > #{thVal1} then 'RAM' when (hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100 > #{thVal1} then 'HDD' else '' END statusCheck from facility_check_01 where 1=1 ) union (select ID,round(cpu_use_qnt) as cpu_use_qnt, round((ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100) as ram_use_qnt, round((hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100) as hdd_use_qnt, chk_Dt , case when (round(cpu_use_qnt) > #{thVal2} || round((ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100) > #{thVal2} || round((hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100) > #{thVal2} ) then '비정상' else '정상' end status , case when cpu_use_qnt > 90.0 then 'CPU' when (ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100 > #{thVal2} then 'RAM' when (hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100 > #{thVal2} then 'Disk 1' when (hdd_use_qnt2/hdd_tot_qnt2)*100 > #{thVal2} then 'Disk 2' when (hdd_use_qnt3/hdd_tot_qnt3)*100 > #{thVal2} then 'Disk 3' else '' END statusCheck from facility_check_02 where 1=1 ) union (select ID, 0 as cpu_use_qnt, 0 as ram_use_qnt, 0 as hdd_use_qnt, chk_Dt , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '비정상' else '정상' end status , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '네트워크' else '' END statusCheck from facility_check_03 where 1=1 ) union (select ID, 0 as cpu_use_qnt, 0 as ram_use_qnt, 0 as hdd_use_qnt, chk_Dt , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '비정상' else '정상' end status , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '네트워크' else '' END statusCheck from facility_check_04 where 1=1 ) union (select ID, 0 as cpu_use_qnt, 0 as ram_use_qnt, 0 as hdd_use_qnt, chk_Dt , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '비정상' else '정상' end status , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '네트워크' else '' END statusCheck from facility_check_05 where 1=1 ) )TB WHERE 1=1 and TA.ID = TB.ID AND TA.hdqr_Cd = #{hdqrCd} AND date_format(TB.chk_Dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') between DATE_SUB(${date} , INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) AND ${date} ;

SELECT TB.chk_Dt, TA.hdqr_nm, TA.pss_nm, TA.FCL_NM,TB.cpu_use_qnt,TB.ram_use_qnt,TB.hdd_use_qnt,TA.power_bizp_nm, TB.status ,TB.statusCheck FROM facility TA, ( (select ID,round(cpu_use_qnt) as cpu_use_qnt, round((ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100) as ram_use_qnt, round((hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100) as hdd_use_qnt, chk_Dt , case when (round(cpu_use_qnt) > #{thVal1} || round((ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100) > #{thVal1} || round((hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100) > #{thVal1} ) then '비정상' else '정상' end status , case when cpu_use_qnt > 90.0 then 'CPU' when (ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100 > #{thVal1} then 'RAM' when (hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100 > #{thVal1} then 'HDD' else '' END statusCheck from facility_check_01 where 1=1 ) union (select ID,round(cpu_use_qnt) as cpu_use_qnt, round((ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100) as ram_use_qnt, round((hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100) as hdd_use_qnt, chk_Dt , case when (round(cpu_use_qnt) > #{thVal2} || round((ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100) > #{thVal2} || round((hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100) > #{thVal2} ) then '비정상' else '정상' end status , case when cpu_use_qnt > 90.0 then 'CPU' when (ram_use_qnt/ram_tot_qnt)*100 > #{thVal2} then 'RAM' when (hdd_use_qnt/hdd_tot_qnt)*100 > #{thVal2} then 'Disk 1' when (hdd_use_qnt2/hdd_tot_qnt2)*100 > #{thVal2} then 'Disk 2' when (hdd_use_qnt3/hdd_tot_qnt3)*100 > #{thVal2} then 'Disk 3' else '' END statusCheck from facility_check_02 where 1=1 ) union (select ID, 0 as cpu_use_qnt, 0 as ram_use_qnt, 0 as hdd_use_qnt, chk_Dt , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '비정상' else '정상' end status , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '네트워크' else '' END statusCheck from facility_check_03 where 1=1 ) union (select ID, 0 as cpu_use_qnt, 0 as ram_use_qnt, 0 as hdd_use_qnt, chk_Dt , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '비정상' else '정상' end status , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '네트워크' else '' END statusCheck from facility_check_04 where 1=1 ) union (select ID, 0 as cpu_use_qnt, 0 as ram_use_qnt, 0 as hdd_use_qnt, chk_Dt , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '비정상' else '정상' end status , case when cnn_sts_yn = '1' then '네트워크' else '' END statusCheck from facility_check_05 where 1=1 ) )TB WHERE 1=1 and TA.ID = TB.ID AND TA.hdqr_Cd = #{hdqrCd} AND date_format(TB.chk_Dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') between DATE_SUB(#{date} , INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) AND #{date} ;
